query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZBST201 SET BS201_GNM = #BS201_GNM#, BS201_SPT = #BS201_SPT#, BS201_DEV = #BS201_DEV#, BS201_TEL = #BS201_TEL#, BS201_ZIP = #BS201_ZIP#, BS201_AD1 = #BS201_AD1#, BS201_AD2 = #BS201_AD2#, BS201_FCD = #BS201_FCD#, BS201_FRT = #BS201_FRT#, BS201_MCD = #BS201_MCD#, BS201_MRT = #BS201_MRT#, BS201_LCD = #BS201_LCD#, BS201_LRT = #BS201_LRT#, BS201_LDT = #BS201_LDT#, BS201_T01 = #BS201_T01#, BS201_T02 = #BS201_T02#, BS201_T03 = #BS201_T03#, BS201_T04 = #BS201_T04#, BS201_T05 = #BS201_T05#, BS201_RMK = #BS201_RMK#, BS201_QTY = #BS201_QTY#, BS201_EAM = #BS201_EAM#, BS201_OAM = #BS201_OAM#, BS201_RAT = #BS201_RAT#, BS201_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), BS201_CID = #BS201_CID#, BS201_UID = #G_USER_ID#, BS201_PID = #BS201_PID#, BS201_GBN = #BS201_GBN#, BS201_AGB = #BS201_AGB#, BS201_USE = #BS201_USE# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND BS201_RDT = #BS201_RDT# AND BS201_SEQ = #BS201_SEQ# AND BS201_SIR = #BS201_SIR#
